attributes.action: Derwent in Derby needs Public Inquiry
attributes.additional_details:
Derby City Council, New Deals for the Community,  Derwent Community Team, Derwent Delivers are all responsible for Squandering £42 million. failure and lack of transparency, refusing to hold a public inquiry although already been judged by their peers to have been at fault.

Turning all properties over to Derby Cricket club rather that the Community for which it was intended, supervised by three Derwent Ward Labour Councillors. who have not answered questions, and refused to do so, only to repeat what we know to be untrue.
For example a motorcycle (one of six) purchased to help our Community, never used only one mile on the clock sold to staff for a fraction of the cost.
We need answers, we need justice. We need a Public Inquiry.

We need your signature to succeed

Derwent and Proud.
